Package controller

Class HDBManagerController

java.lang.Object
controller.HDBManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewProjectInterface
public class HDBManagerController extends Object implements ViewProjectInterface
Controller class for HDB Manager operations in the BTO system. Handles project management, application approval/rejection, officer registrations, and report generation for HDB managers. Implements the ViewProjectInterface to provide project viewing capabilities.

  • Method Details

    • getManagerById

      public Manager getManagerById(String managerID)
      Retrieves a Manager by their ID from the repository.
      Parameters:
      managerID - The ID of the manager to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Manager object if found, null otherwise

    • getManagedActiveProject

      public Project getManagedActiveProject(Manager manager)
      Gets the active project managed by the specified manager. A project is considered active if its closing date is after the current date.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager whose project we're looking for
      Returns:
      The managed project if found and still active, null otherwise

    • approveOrRejectApplication

      public boolean approveOrRejectApplication(Manager manager)
      Allows HDB manager to approve or reject an applicant's application. Displays pending applications for the manager's project and processes the approval or rejection.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager making the approval
      Returns:
      true if approval was successful, false otherwise

    • getPendingApplicationsByProject

      public List<Application> getPendingApplicationsByProject(Project project)
      Gets all applications with PENDING status for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to filter applications for
      Returns:
      List of applications with pending status for the specified project

    • listProject

      public List<Project> listProject(Manager manager, String neighbourhoodFilter, String filterproject)
      Lists projects based on filter criteria. Projects can be filtered by neighborhood and whether they are managed by the current manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager viewing the projects
      neighbourhoodFilter - The neighborhood to filter by (can be null for no filter)
      filterproject - Flag to view projects managed by the manager ("Y") or all projects
      Returns:
      List of projects matching the filter criteria

    • printProjectList

      public void printProjectList(List<Project> projects)
      Prints the list of projects in a formatted table. Displays project details including ID, name, neighborhood, application dates, visibility status, officer slots, manager ID, and flat type information.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to print

    • viewProject

      public void viewProject(User user)
      Implements the ViewProjectInterface method to display projects. Allows the manager to view all projects and filter them by neighborhood or by projects they manage.
      Specified by:
      viewProject in interface ViewProjectInterface
      Parameters:
      user - The user (HDB manager) viewing the projects

    • approveOrRejectWithdrawal

      public void approveOrRejectWithdrawal(User user)
      Allows HDB manager to approve or reject withdrawal applications. Displays withdrawal requests for the manager's project and processes the approval or rejection.
      Parameters:
      user - The HDB manager approving/rejecting the withdrawal

    • reviewOfficerRegistration

      public void reviewOfficerRegistration(User user)
      Allows HDB manager to review officer registration requests. Displays registrations and allows filtering by project.
      Parameters:
      user - The HDB manager reviewing the registrations

    • approveOrRejectOfficerRegistration

      public void approveOrRejectOfficerRegistration(User user)
      Allows HDB manager to approve or reject officer registration requests. Verifies officer slots are available before approval and updates the project with new officers.
      Parameters:
      user - The HDB manager approving/rejecting the registration

    • addOfficerToProject

      public void addOfficerToProject(Project project, Officer officer)
      Adds an officer to a project by updating the officer IDs list and officer slot count. Updates the project in the repository after modification.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to add the officer to
      officer - The officer to add to the project

    • generateReports

      public void generateReports(User user)
      Allows HDB manager to generate and view various reports about applications and projects. Provides options for application status reports, booked applications reports, and project summary reports.
      Parameters:
      user - The HDB manager generating the report
